references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models and demonstrates their superiority over GANs in image generation, impacting the direction of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Label-efficient semantic segmentation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is the first to introduce using activations from diffusion models for semantic segmentation, which is the central focus of the current paper.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, providing the theoretical foundation upon which many subsequent diffusion model approaches, including the current paper, are built.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced Stable Diffusion, a highly influential diffusion model architecture that serves as a key model considered in the current paper.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper introduced the Vision Transformer (ViT), a key architectural component of modern diffusion models like SDXL, which is heavily analyzed in the current paper.
